name: discord-music-bot
description: Bot de Discord para reproducir mÃºsica de YouTube y Spotify

scripts.postinstall: curl -L https://johnvansickle.com/ffmpeg/releases/ffmpeg-release-amd64-static.tar.xz | tar xJ && cp ffmpeg-*-amd64-static/ffmpeg ./ && chmod +x ./ffmpeg && curl -L https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp -o ./yt-dlp && chmod +x ./yt-dlp

author: Tu Nombre
